resources.string:
App created by TrianguloY. This app is not affiliated with WhatsApp Inc. 

>Play Store

>App page

Acknowledgements:
Thanks to Timofey Lisunov for providing the ru (Russian) locale translation!
Thanks to Matheus Damacs for providing the pt (Portuguese) locale translation!
Thanks to Yusuf Emen for providing the tr (Turkish) locale translation!

You can change the app language by clicking the buttons below (the app will be restarted).

This app uses WhatsApp public api to open a chat with any number you enter. No contact is created on the device. 
More info here.

Insert the number and the prefix with no extra characters, only numbers 0–9. You can click on the '+' item to choose from a list.
Example: for +44 (UK) 123 456 7890 write 44 1234567890
\nUse this to create a link that will open WhatsApp when clicked. You can specify a number and/or a message that will be placed on the input box (will NOT, I repeat, will NOT send the message).
Message that will be autocompleted, NOT sent.
Couldn\'t open WhatsApp. Is it installed?
